item.description:
Separations and Divorces - Graceful Untangling

by Yuliya Cohen

Cost $100.00 Early Registration fee if paid by Thursday April 26,

$125 afterward

Time: 10:00 am-5:30pm - This is a full day workshop

The biggest fear of separation, besides the fear of loneliness, is the acute sharpness of seemingly inevitable pain that is a concomitant to a broken relationship. The more sudden the break, the bigger the pain.

This pain can be largely avoided if one understands the energetic basis for coming and staying together in a marriage or a relationship, the principles of energetic exchange and entanglement, and how to keep focused on one's own completeness throughout the process.

In this evening workshop, the participants will learn the practical energetic principles that will allow them to examine and transform their traumatic experiences from those of severed connections to ones of graceful untangling.

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: Divorces and Separations - Graceful Untangling
